title: Mediterranean quinoa and chickpeas
ingredients: ['170g quinoa', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '420ml water', '250g tinned chickpeas, drained', '1 tomato, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '3 tablespoons lime juice', '4 teaspoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley']
